page.title: 11FARLOW PTA SHOW
page.content: Farlow PTA Show, in the second week in August, is the school's main fund raising event. It is held at Farlow & Oreton Village Hall. Characteristically the main hall is set aside for a magnificent display of the entries in the 70 show sections, such as flowers, fruit, cakes, home made wines, handicrafts and children's work. On entering the hall , with over 300 precious exhibits laid out on trestles, one is delighted by the sweet, varied smells and the lovely shapes, textures and colours of the fruits of many hours' work including the art of flower arranging. In the two adjoining fields are tents for refreshments, stalls and sideshows. In the open one can play skittles, darts and tombola or try the coconut shy. Children's favourites are the BMX course and the pony rides.
